publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5211 Elizabeth Smith: Congratulations to Kinross Cricket Club—That the Parliament congratulates Kinross Cricket Club on winning the prestigious Wisden Award as the Gray-Nicolls Club of the Year 2009 for its outstanding success in developing the sport across Kinross-shire. Supported by: Nanette Milne*, Bill Aitken*, Aileen Campbell*, Jackson Carlaw*, Ted Brocklebank*, John Lamont*, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-5211 Congratulations to Kinross Cricket Club (lodged on 17 November 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Scanlon*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Johnstone*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-5211 Elizabeth Smith: Congratulations to Kinross Cricket Club—That the Parliament congratulates Kinross Cricket Club on winning the prestigious Wisden Award as the Gray-Nicolls Club of the Year 2009 for its outstanding success in developing the sport across Kinross-shire. Supported by: Nanette Milne, Bill Aitken, Aileen Campbell, Jackson Carlaw, Ted Brocklebank, John Lamont, Jamie McGrigor, Mary Mulligan, Jackie Baillie, Mary Scanlon, Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Stewart Maxwell, Alex Johnstone, Gil Paterson
S3M-5211 Congratulations to Kinross Cricket Club (lodged on 17 November 2009) Ross Finnie*
S3M-5211 Congratulations to Kinross Cricket Club (lodged on 17 November 2009) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-5211 Congratulations to Kinross Cricket Club (lodged on 17 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
